name: Unhealthy Orbs
description:
Unhealthy orbs is a game where you have to avoid the orbs and kill all the enemies who throw them at you. When you dont do anything, the time slow down, and you have a lot of time to think, until you do your move!

It is a frenetic game that requires a lot of skill to achieve the win, so be prepared and take a breath, but most important, have fun!
